document_data.name: ''Rod of Cancellation''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''rod of cancellation''''' was a powerful [[magic item]] that drained other magic items of their enchantments.
document_data.Powers: For a ''rod of cancellation'' to drain the power from another magic item, the ''rod'' needed to physically touch the target item. Once drained, a magic item could never have its lost powers restored even via a ''[[wish]]''. A ''rod of cancellation'' became brittle and useless once its power was used successfully.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Thardock]], who was an officer in the [[Purple Dragons]], carried a ''rod of cancellation''.
